txt.en: Lead the Charge Captains inflict heavy damage to their foes while enhancing their allies' prowess.

Sure Strike will bestow Relentless Attack to the Fellowship when used while Battle-readied.

Relentless Attack:
+5% Damage
+2% Critical Chance
-5% Attack Duration
Duration: 45s
\nScoring a Critical Hit causes your target to take 2% more damage for 10s. This effect stacks with Telling Mark and Oathbreaker's Shame.
